url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Druid/Druids/Fey friend/Pai Spiritwind

sections.body: An inhabitant of a fey-infested forest, Pai fiercely advocates for the fey and their causes. After many run-ins with destructive humans, she considers all non-fey creatures (excluding gnomes) to be trespassers and attacks them on sight.

name: Pai Spiritwind
